page.title: 17RISELEY PLAYGROUP
page.content: Riseley Playgroup celebrated 18 years this year. It was one of the first to be registared with the Playgroup Association. It takes children from the age of 2.5 years to 5 years although most manage to get into nursery school which is attached to the lower school,by the age of 4 years. There is also a mother's and toddlers' group which is aimed at mothers and babies. They meet once a week in the village hall for coffee and a quick chat. The playgroup meets twice a week from 9.30 a.m. to 11.30 a.m. There are two supervisors and these are mums who help out on the rota system. The children play games,paint,have stories and learn to share and get on with one another.
